attributes.action: A call for an; all-party-free vote; to allow a UK crime-advice help line for, potential criminals and any concerned family or friends etc.
attributes.additional_details: A petition dedicated to creating a UK, legally protected, anonymous to call, crime advice line, for anyone (including concerned family and friends) who has or is thinking of committing a crime:  all crime-line conversations must have a legally protected confidentiality. Any adviser/negotiator taking part in any advice session, must be legally protected; against any criminal or civil prosecution, for refusing to disclose any details; about the caller or the crime, to any outside body, including the police or any past or intended victims of the crime.
